author: abcoathup
content:
Draft PR 6800 (Verkle trees) was created two minutes after PR 6799
https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/6800
https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/6799

I have assigned number 6799, EIP editors feel free to override this.
https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/6800/files#r1152651674

Whilst we want the EIP process to be as easy as possible for EIP editors, we want to avoid any perception of special treatment for important core EIPs.

[UPDATE] assigned number 6800 by <@543900561460822016>: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/6800/commits/43bb39436da52dbc5aaa46786da404e929224f86#r1152654153
